name: Good Days
lyrics:
[Verse 1: SZA]
Good day in my mind, safe to take a step out
Get some air now, letâ€…yoâ€…edge out
Too soon,â€…I spoke
You be heavy in myâ€…mind, can you get the heck out?
I need rest now, got me bummed out
You so, you so, you
Baby, baby, babe
I've been on my empty mind shit

I try to keep from losin' the rest of me
I worry that I wasted the best of me on you, babe
You don't care
Said, "Not tryna be a nuisance, this is urgent"
Tryna make sense of loose change
Got me a war in my mind
Gotta let go of weight, can't keep what's holdin' me
Choose to watch while the world break up in front of me

[Chorus: SZA, Jacob Collier & Both]
All the while, I'll await my armored fate with a smile
Still wanna try, still believe in
Good days, good days, always
Always inside (Always in my mind, always in my mind, mind)
Good day living in my mind
[Verse 2: SZA, Jacob Collier]
Tell me I'm not my fears, my limitations
I disappear if you let me
Feelin' like, yeah (On your own)
Feelin' like Jericho
Feelin' like Job when he lost his shit
Gotta hold my own, my cross to bear alone, I
Ooh, played and dipped, way to kill the mood
Know you like that shit
Can't groove it, ba-baby
Heavy on my empty mind shit

[Pre-Chorus: SZA]
I gotta keep from losin' the rest of me (Rest of me)
Still worry that I wasted the best of me on you, babe
You don't care
Said, "Not tryna be a nuisance, this is urgent" (It's urgent)
Tryna make sense of loose change
Got me a war in my mind (My mind)
Gotta let go of weight, can't keep what's holdin' me
Choose to watch while the world break up in front of me

[Chorus: SZA, Jacob Collier & Both]
All the while, I'll await my armored fate with a smile
Still wanna try, still believe in
Good days, good days, always (Good days on my mind, good days on my mind)
Sunny inside (Always in my mind, always in my mind, mind)
Good day living in my mind
[Verse 3: SZA]
Gotta get right
Tryna free my mind before the end of the world
I don't miss no ex, I don't miss no text
I choose not to respond
I don't regret, just pretend shit never happened
Half of us layin' waste to our youth, it's in the present
(Na-na, na-na, na-na, na)
Half of us chasin' fountains of youth and it's in the present now

[Outro: Jacob Collier]
Always in my mind, always in my mind, mind
You've been making me feel like I'm
Always in my mind, always in my mind, mind158EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

name: Paradise Kiss
lyrics:
Mixed Matches tag

â€â€â€[â€Intro]
â€â€â€You seem like you're doing real well
I take it things are good withâ€…Arashi
Don'tâ€…look at meâ€…like that, it's been about twoâ€…years now
I got over it a long time ago
If you still don't want to see me, though, I understand (Woaahhh)
And I'll do my best to respect that (Woaahhh)
But, if it's not too much trouble (â€Woaahhh)
It'd be nice if you could drop by my folks' joint with Arashi once in awhile
My mom and dad miss you guys (â€Woaahhh)

[Chorus]
Shawty wanna spend the night out (night out)
I said, I just might catch you later no doubt
Hop up in my Tesla, I'm in route
Leave her shocked like Zatch Bell, her lights out

Shawty wanna spend the night out (night out)
I said, I just might catch you later no doubt
Hop up in my Tesla, I'm in route
Leave her shocked like Zatch Bell, her lights out

[Verse]
In the club, let's just run it up
By the way she talkinâ€™ I think shawty fell in love
Is she really plotting, or just falling for the drugs
If I'm wrong Iâ€™ll say I'm sorry
My true thoughts are so unjust
No trust, like Arashi
I can't tell I hurt your soul, just like Yukari
Why the hell I messed things up before it started
Switching up the setting real fast, let's just dead this party

All your haunting pain, take it all away
From your eyes okay, tonight!
Letâ€™s be on our way, to a sacred place
This will be our paradise
Way beyond the planes, where the angels play
That where shorty came, no lie
Every night I pray, that you have to stay
'Cause you are my only light

[Outro]
What's going on? Why are you ignoring me?
Can't really say, perhaps it's 'cause I'm jealous
What?
Would you mind giving me some space, I'm feeling very rooted right now1EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy

name: 24k
lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh yeah, top of the morning, ladies and gentlemen
We flyin' above the sky
It's thirty thousandâ€…feetâ€…in the airâ€…right now
Last Year Was Weird
LYWW Radio,â€…let's go

Too much on my plate that I can't compromise
If you can't keep the rhythm, gotta take what you have

On to the next, never do slow down
Yeah, they wanna peep, but they can't solve mine

I didn't need a present

Why did you think that I would let you in?
No, I don't roll that way

No, I don't roll that way

Days fly by witnessed
But you're caught up in the minute
Mind your own business
Mind your own

Mind your own business
Mind your own

We don't have no reasons to rewind
Give me two feet, we're out of time

Mind your own
Do you mind?

name: 3 AM
lyrics:
[Intro]
Hey, uh, what's up?
Just calling to see if you're still up
But straight to voicemail, uh
Yeah,â€…noâ€…biggie
Um, if you'reâ€…up or whatever, just hit meâ€…up

Now you're calling
3 AM, my head is spinning
Pushed off the sheets from my bed
'Cause the phone keeps ringing
All I keep thinking is, "Have I lost my mind?"
But I'm picking up for the last time

[Verse 1]
Either way, I'm gonna lose
But I just wanna give
I just can't stop staring at it
I just can't resist

I'm floating away
Keep floating away
Floating away, floating away
I'm floating away
Keep floating away
Floating away, floating away
[Chorus]
Now you're calling
3 AM, my head is spinning
Pushed off the sheets from my bed
'Cause the phone keeps ringing
All I keep thinking is, "Have I lost my mind?"
But I'm picking up for the last time

[Bridge]
You and I don't have to meet
But it's fun to think we could
On the screen and in my jeans
Just make me feel good

[Pre-Chorus]
I'm floating away
Keep floating away
Floating away, floating away
I'm floating away
Keep floating away
Floating away, floating away

[Chorus]
Now you're calling
3 AM, my head is spinning
Pushed off the sheets from my bed
'Cause the phone keeps ringing

Now you're calling, 3 AM2EmbedShare URLCopyEmbedCopy
